channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Julie Menin Is Elected New York City Council Speaker

item.title: Nick Reiner's attorney removes himself from case
item.description: Defense attorney Alan Jackson said that circumstances beyond his and Reiner's control made it "impossible" to continue representation.

item.title: What We Know About Trump’s Crime and Immigration Crackdown Across the U.S.
item.description: The president has sent federal agents to Democratic-led cities in several states, prompting lawsuits and stirring anger among local leaders.

item.title: Philip Yancey, Prominent Christian Author, Admits to Extramarital Affair
item.description: He said he would retire from writing and public speaking.
